title: ORDERFLOW SETUP A+ The ICT Reaper (Bitcoin & ETH)
description: Advanced A+ setup for Bitcoin and ETH using orderflow and ICT principles.
content:
In this lesson, you'll learn:

• What constitutes an A+ setup
• Liquidity sweep identification
• Displacement recognition
• Orderflow shift mechanisms
• Crypto volatility management
• HTF confluence for confirmation

quiz.question: An A+ setup requires:
quiz.explanation: A+ setups show clear liquidity grab followed by strong impulsive displacement.

quiz.question: Orderflow shift is identified by:
quiz.explanation: Strong orderflow shift creates consecutive strong candles in one direction.

quiz.question: Crypto volatility requires:
quiz.explanation: Crypto's high volatility means wider stops are needed to avoid getting shaken out.

quiz.question: A true reaper entry occurs after:
quiz.explanation: Reaper entries happen after liquidity is grabbed and the expansion begins.

quiz.question: HTF confluence improves:
quiz.explanation: When higher timeframes confirm the A+ setup, accuracy improves significantly.
